reviewText: Just as I remembered it!  My 2 1/2 year old son loves it!  Even my husband was learning things about the Bible.  The songs are cute and catchy, and easy for the kids to pick up on.  The best one is the books of the Bible song, which i still remember to this day and use it to remember where the books of the Bible are when looking up scripture.
LOVE this movie! It's such a good movie for kids! I grew up watching this movie and still know the words to the songs!
Works great & replaces the video that our daughters had when they were younger.  Planning to share this with a group of kids that do not know much about the Bible!

This video teaches children many basics and bits about the Bible in fun songs and with delightful characters.  My children ask to watch it over and over!  It gives them a good sense of the many things that can be found and learned in the Bible.
